review.replaced_sentence: I started using this mouse recently and have started liking it.
review.sentence: I started using this mouse recently and have started liking it.

review.replaced_sentence: There is nothing bad about this mouse and all its features work excellent.
review.sentence: There is nothing bad about this mouse and all its features work excellent.

review.replaced_sentence: I recently stopped using my wireless keyboard and mouse because of it connectivity/sleep activation and precision issues in case of mouse (wireless).
review.sentence: I recently stopped using my wireless keyboard and mouse because of it connectivity/sleep activation and precision issues in case of mouse (wireless).

review.replaced_sentence: I ordered Microsoft Natural Ergonomic 4000 Keyboard as it was the best available wired keyboard from Mircosoft.
review.sentence: I ordered Microsoft Natural Ergonomic 4000 Keyboard as it was the best available wired keyboard from Mircosoft.

review.replaced_sentence: Strangely it wasn't sold along with a mouse of same style and looks.
review.sentence: Strangely it wasn't sold along with a mouse of same style and looks.

review.replaced_sentence: So after looking for a while, I came across this mouse and thought of giving a try.
review.sentence: So after looking for a while, I came across this mouse and thought of giving a try.

review.replaced_sentence: They both go well looks wise.
review.sentence: They both go well looks wise.

review.replaced_sentence: Following points would describe its pros and cons;PROS:- Professional looks.
review.sentence: Following points would describe its pros and cons;PROS:- Professional looks.

review.replaced_sentence: Excellent styling and looks.- Quality material.
review.sentence: Excellent styling and looks.- Quality material.

review.replaced_sentence: It has a mat finish and not glossy.- Guaranteed precision pointing.
review.sentence: It has a mat finish and not glossy.- Guaranteed precision pointing.

review.replaced_sentence: Perfect movement and precision pointing which was one of the reason I moved to wired components.- Scroll wheel is amazingly smooth and works perfectly fine.
review.sentence: Perfect movement and precision pointing which was one of the reason I moved to wired components.- Scroll wheel is amazingly smooth and works perfectly fine.

review.replaced_sentence: Important point to note is, download its configuaration software from [...]Once you install this software cum drivers, you can configure the scroll wheel according to your requirement.
review.sentence: Important point to note is, download its configuaration software from [...]Once you install this software cum drivers, you can configure the scroll wheel according to your requirement.

review.replaced_sentence: I read reviews about scroll wheel not working properly but it's incorrect.
review.sentence: I read reviews about scroll wheel not working properly but it's incorrect.

review.replaced_sentence: Horizontal and Vertical scrolling works absolutely fine.
review.sentence: Horizontal and Vertical scrolling works absolutely fine.
Though remember it's a smaooth scroll and there is no clicks when you scroll vertically.

review.replaced_sentence: I love it.- Left button and Right button can be set in the configuaration software to ease our tasks.
review.sentence: I love it.- Left button and Right button can be set in the configuaration software to ease our tasks.

review.replaced_sentence: The default assigned purpose of these buttons is to go Forward and Back while browsing.- So called its BlueTrack technology works well on wooden desk, paper and leather like material.
review.sentence: The default assigned purpose of these buttons is to go Forward and Back while browsing.- So called its BlueTrack technology works well on wooden desk, paper and leather like material.

review.replaced_sentence: Though keep in mind the mouse works on a light beneath it, so it won't work on transperent glass or mirrored surface according to the manual.- Plug and play, No hassel.
review.sentence: Though keep in mind the mouse works on a light beneath it, so it won't work on transperent glass or mirrored surface according to the manual.- Plug and play, No hassel.
Basic feature like vertical scroll and pointer started working out of the box.

review.replaced_sentence: For all other extra features install the software from the above link.- Fairly priced, may be on the cheaper side.CONS:- Personal opinion: the width on top of the mouse is bigger than most of them available in the market.
review.sentence: For all other extra features install the software from the above link.- Fairly priced, may be on the cheaper side.CONS:- Personal opinion: the width on top of the mouse is bigger than most of them available in the market.

review.replaced_sentence: I have a small hands though it's not a big deal, I may get used to it soon.Overall:As expected from Microsoft, this product is a well built product with pro looks and that is why I prefer Microsoft over any other brand (even Logitech).
review.sentence: I have a small hands though it's not a big deal, I may get used to it soon.Overall:As expected from Microsoft, this product is a well built product with pro looks and that is why I prefer Microsoft over any other brand (even Logitech).

review.replaced_sentence: Yes it costs more but what you get is what you pay for.
review.sentence: Yes it costs more but what you get is what you pay for.

review.replaced_sentence: I am a Software Engineer and have ordered this mouse for daily use at home.
review.sentence: I am a Software Engineer and have ordered this mouse for daily use at home.

review.replaced_sentence: No more the mouse sleeps or looses its smooth pointing and also no more battery issues.Though I recommend not to forget the installation of the software cum driver from Microsoft's website.
review.sentence: No more the mouse sleeps or looses its smooth pointing and also no more battery issues.Though I recommend not to forget the installation of the software cum driver from Microsoft's website.
